devmeta.title: WEMIX Inc
devmeta.description: The WEMIX Council Node Partner is a council that has the right to decide the governance directions - economic/code/policy. Through this process, the decisions made will be recorded on the blockchain, and the results will be executed by the codes pre-defined before the voting. The topics will vary but be in the three categories; economics, policy and code. NCP is allowed to participate in the voting related to these topics. For instance, if there’s a plan of changing the gas fee rate or additional issuance of WEMIX, NCP can participate in the decision. Or if there is a need for technical improvement or additional features, they will be listed as topics which will be discussed and decided by NCPs. We’re inviting you to join WEMIX as a Node Council Partner (“NCP”) who will operate the ecosystem together by participating in the decision makings.
